title: Rainbows
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 379 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 530L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     M and P
description: Rainbows are optical illusions that have captivated people's attention and imagination throughout time. Rainbows provides students with a comprehensive explanation of the science behind these tricks of light, including detailed diagrams of how the movement of sunlight through water drops causes such a spectacular sight. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose and to effectively ask and answer questions. The book and lesson are also available for levels M and P.
